mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(sum(booking_price), 0) totalPrice , IFNULL(round(AVG(booking_price)), 0) avgPrice , COUNT(booking_price) totalCnt , MONTH(booking_date) month FROM booking WHERE booking_company_id = #{companyId} AND booking_state = '방문완료' AND YEAR(booking_date) = #{year} GROUP BY YEAR(booking_date) DESC, MONTH(booking_date) ASC

SELECT IFNULL(sum(booking_price), 0) totalPrice , IFNULL(round(AVG(booking_price)), 0) avgPrice , COUNT(booking_price) totalCnt , YEAR(booking_date) year FROM booking WHERE booking_company_id = #{companyId} AND booking_state = '방문완료' GROUP BY YEAR(booking_date) DESC

SELECT bp.booking_product_name productName , bp.booking_product_no productNo , COUNT(bp.booking_product_name) cnt FROM booking b INNER JOIN booking_product bp ON b.product_no = bp.booking_product_no WHERE b.booking_company_id = #{companyId} GROUP BY bp.booking_product_name ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 0, 5
